title: Terrains
description: A list of terrain types, including their stats and movement properties.

production.title: Production
production.description: Production per-turn yield provided by this terrain.

food.title: Food
food.description: Food yield per-turn provided by this terrain.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Gold yield per-turn provided by this terrain.

science.title: Science
science.description: Science per-turn yield provided by this terrain.

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: Culture per-turn yield provided by this terrain.

happiness.title: Happiness
happiness.description: Happiness per-turn yield provided by this terrain.

faith.title: Faith
faith.description: Faith per-turn yield provided by this terrain.

impassable.title: Impassable
impassable.description: When true, no unit can enter unless it has a special unique.

unbuildable.title: Unbuildable
unbuildable.description: If true, nothing can be built here - not even resource improvements.

occursOn.title: Occurs On
occursOn.description: For terrain features - List of terrains that this feature can appear on.

overrideStats.title: Override Stats
overrideStats.description: For terrain features - indicates the stats of this terrain override those of all previous layers.

turnsInto.title: Turns Into
turnsInto.description: Used by Natural Wonders: it is the baseTerrain on top of which the Natural Wonder is placed.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Only for NaturalWonder: relative weight of being picked by the map generator.

uniques.description: Unique properties or effects of this terrain.
